name: Danger Drop
description:
You are Sent by an extraterrestrial civilization to test your capabilities, as an advanced artificial general intelligence entity (AGIE) you must navigate through challenging levels filled with perilous obstacles.



Your ultimate mission? Clear each level without succumbing to a fatal fall and find your way back to the Mothership.



Success in this mission will not only prove your worth but also grant you the opportunity to live amongst the enigmatic extraterrestrial society and contribute to their ever-evolving advancements. Prepare to push your limits, showcase your agility, and unlock the secrets of the cosmos in this thrilling platformer.



∎Challenging platformer gameplay: Navigate through levels filled with perilous obstacles, requiring precision and skill to overcome.

∎Engaging level design: Explore a variety of levels with increasing difficulty, offering a rewarding progression curve for players.

∎Fluid movement mechanics: Experience responsive and fluid movement controls, allowing for precise jumps, maneuvers, and traversal.

∎Future updates: Stay tuned for future updates and additional features to keep the game fresh and exciting
